title: The Launch: Fashion News to Know This June
excerpt: Plus, more fashion news to know this month.
text: June’s lineup of drops, collaborations, and store openings is set to gear you up for everything summer has in store. To get started, Lila Moss and Zac Posen are all smiles for GapStudio’s summer drop; plus, Moncler Genius and Donald Glover collaborated on a capsule. From major fashion moments to can’t-miss releases, here’s everything you need to know this month.Courtesy of Silvia TcherassiWho: Silvia TcherassiWhat: Capri capsule collectionWhere: At Silvia Tcherassi’s boutique in CapriWhy: Silvia Tcherassi is taking inspiration from the beautiful terrain of Capri. The Colombian designer just released a vibrant collection that echoes the cerulean Mediterranean waters and coral sunset sky of the popular summer destination. Pieces include patterned maxi dresses, a red draped halter dress, and a limited raspberry edition of the Sofia bag, each perfect for taking you from day to night on the Italian coastline. If you can’t make it to Capri to shop the pieces, you can make an online inquiry here.Silvia Tcherassi Mayfair TunicSilvia Tcherassi Sofia BagSilvia Tcherassi Dilara Dress SetGapStudio Releases Summer DropCourtesy of GapStudioWho: GapStudioWhat: Summer collectionWhere: Online at gap.comWhat: GapStudio, designed by creative director Zac Posen, just released its summer drop. Filled with sun-faded draped denim, all-new chambray silhouettes, and voile fabrics, the collection reimagines denim as a lightweight and refined summer staple. Lila Moss fronts the campaign, shot in the studio with Posen and embodying the effortless and editorial energy of the pieces. The summer drop is now available in select Gap stores and online at gap.com.GapStudio Vintage Soft STUDIO SweatshirtGapStudio Voile ShirtdressGapStudio High Rise Draped Denim TrousersMoncler Genius Taps Donald Glover for Latest CollaborationCourtesy of MonclerWho: Moncler GeniusWhat: Collaboration with Donald GloverWhere: Online at moncler.comWhy: Moncler Genius has teamed up with Donald Glover for an all-new, vibrantly colored collection called “The City of Genius by Gilga Farm.” Envisioned as a creative incubator, the artist’s farmhouse and orchard are described as an environment perfect for cultivating the forefront of culture. The collection draws directly from its surroundings, presenting lightweight puffers, transitional jackets, and T-shirts in citrus hues, soft peaches, and navy blues. Moncler Genius Trailgrip Vela Leather SandalsMoncler Genius Baseball CapMoncler Genius Navel Suede Shirt Jacket J.Crew Partners With Masseria San DomenicoCourtesy of J. CrewWho: J.CrewWhat: Partnership with Masseria San DomenicoWhere: Puglia, Italy and online at jcrew.comWhat: J.Crew is having an Italian summer. This June, the iconic American brand partnered with boutique hotel Masseria San Domenico in Puglia for an exclusive activation from June 17th-20th. The two celebrated the collaboration, inviting a curated selection of tastemakers for a weekend of seaside activities. If you’re unable to make your way to Italy this June, the partnership is also commemorated by a capsule collection of home goods, summer apparel, and accessories, all available online at jcrew.com.J.Crew Masseria San Domenico X J.Crew silk bandanaJ.Crew Masseria San Domenico X J.Crew Gamine eyelet-trim shirtJ.Crew Masseria San Domenico X J.Crew embroidered baseball cap(RED) and La DoubleJ Team Up for a Rose-Filled CollaborationAB + DMWho: (RED) and La DoubleJWhat: Capsule collection Where: Online at ladoublej.comWhy: This summer, you can shop for a good cause. (RED) and Milan-based homeware and apparel designer La DoubleJ have teamed up for an exclusive capsule collection. La DoubleJ founder J.J. Martin has long admired (RED)’s leadership in the fight against AIDS and was inspired to create a unique rose-covered print that embodies the spirit of both the organization’s mission and the women-led community of her own brand. In addition to the three-piece collaboration, Martin and (RED) creative council chair Laura Brown met in New York to shoot a star-studded campaign featuring empowering women, including Iman, Busy Philipps, and Micaela Erlanger. All proceeds from the collaboration will be donated to (RED) in support of its ongoing initiatives. The pieces are now available online at ladoublej.com.La DoubleJ Mini Foulard Eclipse BurgundyLa DoubleJ Pull-Up ShortsLa DoubleJ Better Than Your Boyfriend's Shirt Haider Ackermann Releases His Second Collection With Canada GooseWilly VanderperreWho: Canada GooseWhat: Snow Goose by Canada GooseWhere: Online at canadagoose.comWhy: Haider Ackermann is keeping busy. Following his first collection for Canada Goose last fall, and his buzzy debut for Tom Ford, the all-star designer is showing no signs of slowing down. This summer, Ackermann is back for his second installment of Snow Goose by Canada Goose. Inspired by the rough-and-tumble terrain of Utah, the collection seamlessly blends the brand’s archives with breathable silhouettes and lightweight fabrics. The spring 2025 selection is available online now at canadagoose.com.Canada Goose Dawn Crew RelaxedCanada Goose Mesa T-ShirtCanada Goose Dawn Crew RelaxedLele Sadoughi Partners With Fine Artist Gray MalinCourtesy of Lele SadoughiWho: Lele SadoughiWhat: Capsule collection with Gray Malin Where: Online at lelesadoughi.comWhy: New York City-based designer Lele Sadoughi and L.A.-based fine artist Gray Mallin have teamed up for a travel-inspired capsule collection. The two bonded over their shared hometown of Dallas and worked closely together to produce the 13-piece collaboration. Blending Sadoughi’s designs with Malin’s scenic photography, each piece is the perfect addition to your vacation wardrobe. The collection is now available online as well as at select Lele Sadoughi retailers. Lele Sadoughi Capri Long Brim Bucket HatNow 78% OffLele Sadoughi Libby Provence Bow BarretteNow 60% OffLele Sadoughi La Fontelina Bucket BagNow 83% OffLongchamp Opens a Flower-Filled Sidewalk CaféMike VitelliWho: LongchampWhat: Sidewalk caféWhere: Longchamp Fifth Avenue flagshipWhy: Longchamp is brightening up the New York City sidewalks. From June 11 to July 6, the iconic brand will open an outdoor café, La Boulangerie, outside its New York City Fifth Avenue flagship. Crafted in collaboration with the world-famous Angelina Paris patisserie, the one-of-a-kind street dining experience features a delicious selection of Parisian pastries. As an official partner of Fifth Avenue Blooms, the café opening also kicks off a month-long floral installation that effortlessly captures the bustling energy of the city streets. Inside, the store will also debut a new capsule collection from ceramicist Constantin Riant, whose blue-and-white designs inspired the installation’s palette.Longchamp Silk Scarf 70Longchamp Cobalt SweatshirtLongchamp Canvas Tote BagGap and Malbon Partner on a Golf CapsuleCourtesy of GapWho: Gap What: Capsule collection with Malbon GolfWhere: Online at gap.comWhy: The weather is heating up, and so is the competition on the course. Blending classic prep style with athleticism, Gap and Malbon have partnered to release a 33-piece capsule that bridges the sport’s iconic style across every generation. Reimagined pieces include preppy polos, stylish Bermuda shorts, cable-knit vests, and perfectly worn-in T-shirts emblazoned with “PAR.” The collaboration launches alongside the “Generation Golf” campaign, shot by Duncan Wolf and starring five-time PGA tour winner Jesper Parnevik, as well as his children, Phoenix and Peg Parnevik—turning the event into a family affair. Gap x Malbon Baseball HatGap x Malbon Crop Polo SweaterGap × Malbon Plaid Pleated Mini SkortMoncler Releases a New Footwear CollectionCourtrsy of MonclerWho: MonclerWhat: Third edition of Studio AscentiWhere: New York CityWhy: Moncler knows how to unveil a new collection, and for the third edition of Studio Ascenti—the open-format experiential footwear space which first launched in Milan and Paris—the brand brought footwear enthusiasts high above the New York City skyline. A new “family” of footwear, the Moncler Altive, was introduced, while three new iterations were added to the Moncler Trailgrip family along with special collabs from fashion insiders and celeb friends like Rick Owens, Donald Glover, and Willow Smith.Moncler Trailgrip GTX SneakersMoncler Trailgrip Momint Nubuck & Suede SneakersMoncler Trailgrip Knit High Top SneakersCasablanca Opens a Flagship Store in Pariscourtesy of CasablancaWho: CasablancaWhat: Flagship boutiqueWhere: ParisWhy: Casablanca is going worldwide. For the first time, the brand will open its doors in Paris on the iconic Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré—a sort of homecoming for designer and founder Charaf Tajer, who was born in the French capital. The exterior blends seamlessly with the classic architecture of the prestigious 8th arrondissement, meanwhile, the inside represents Casablanca’s contemporary DNA. Interior aesthetics channel a myriad of inspirations, including Japanese futurism, ancient Greece, and Stanley Kubrick’s 2001: A Space Odyssey. The boutique was created in partnership with London-based designers Counterfeit Studio and Moroccan architecture firm Elements Lab.Casablanca Cotton Tuck Stitch Cropped Polo ShirtCasablanca Crystal Embellished Denim ShortsCasablanca Colourblock SwimsuitAgua by Agua Bendita Taps Andrea Wild Botero for a Limited-Edition CapsuleCourtesy of Agua by Agua BenditaWho: Agua by Agua BenditaWhat: Capsule collection with Andrea Wild Botero Where: Online at overthemoon.comWhy: Agua by Agua Bendita continues to craft the perfect summer wardrobe. This season, the Colombian brand is teaming up with independent artist Andrea Wild Botero for a capsule collection filled with embroideries inspired by her childhood in Cartagena. “This collaboration is a celebration of our shared love for Latin America and our commitment to exhibit the unexplored beauty of our region,” Mariana Hinestroza and Catalina Álvarez, co-founders and creative directors of the brand, said in a statement. Titled “Wild,” the 16-piece collab is filled with beautiful motifs depicting vegetation and wildlife, all nostalgic to Botero and signature to Agua by Agua Bendita designs. Silhouettes include flowing midis, textured minidresses, wrap skirts, and one-piece bathing suits in ornate patterns, perfect for any warm-weather occasion. Agua by Agua Bendita Eslabon Wild Cropped topAgua by Agua Bendita Barbara Wild Midi DressAgua by Agua Bendita Frontera Wild Midi DressFrame and Sotheby’s Release a Capsule CollectionCourtesy of David William Baum/FrameWho: FrameWhat: Exclusive capsule collectionWhere: Online at frame-store.comWhy: Frame and Sotheby’s have confirmed that ’80s New York will never go out of style. This summer, the two have teamed up to release an all-new collaboration that honors the art auctioneer’s 281-year legacy and inspires the next generation of collectors. From oversized blazers to argyle sweaters and retro T-shirts cheekily emblazoned with “COLLECTOR,” the pieces are perfect for Gen Zers who aspire to dress like Carolyn Bessette Kennedy, off-duty Wall Street bros, and any prepster in between. Frame Classic TeeFrame Baseball CapFrame V-Neck Sweater
html:
June’s lineup of drops, collaborations, and store openings is set to gear you up for everything summer has in store. To get started, Lila Moss and Zac Posen are all smiles for GapStudio’s summer drop; plus, Moncler Genius and Donald Glover collaborated on a capsule. From major fashion moments to can’t-miss releases, here’s everything you need to know this month.

Who: Silvia Tcherassi

What: Capri capsule collection

Where: At Silvia Tcherassi’s boutique in Capri

Why: Silvia Tcherassi is taking inspiration from the beautiful terrain of Capri. The Colombian designer just released a vibrant collection that echoes the cerulean Mediterranean waters and coral sunset sky of the popular summer destination. Pieces include patterned maxi dresses, a red draped halter dress, and a limited raspberry edition of the Sofia bag, each perfect for taking you from day to night on the Italian coastline. If you can’t make it to Capri to shop the pieces, you can make an online inquiry here.

Silvia Tcherassi Mayfair Tunic

Silvia Tcherassi Sofia Bag

Silvia Tcherassi Dilara Dress Set

GapStudio Releases Summer Drop

Who: GapStudio

What: Summer collection

Where: Online at gap.com

What: GapStudio, designed by creative director Zac Posen, just released its summer drop. Filled with sun-faded draped denim, all-new chambray silhouettes, and voile fabrics, the collection reimagines denim as a lightweight and refined summer staple. Lila Moss fronts the campaign, shot in the studio with Posen and embodying the effortless and editorial energy of the pieces. The summer drop is now available in select Gap stores and online at gap.com.

GapStudio Vintage Soft STUDIO Sweatshirt

GapStudio Voile Shirtdress

GapStudio High Rise Draped Denim Trousers

Moncler Genius Taps Donald Glover for Latest Collaboration

Who: Moncler Genius

What: Collaboration with Donald Glover

Where: Online at moncler.com

Why: Moncler Genius has teamed up with Donald Glover for an all-new, vibrantly colored collection called “The City of Genius by Gilga Farm.” Envisioned as a creative incubator, the artist’s farmhouse and orchard are described as an environment perfect for cultivating the forefront of culture. The collection draws directly from its surroundings, presenting lightweight puffers, transitional jackets, and T-shirts in citrus hues, soft peaches, and navy blues.

Moncler Genius Trailgrip Vela Leather Sandals

Moncler Genius Baseball Cap

Moncler Genius Navel Suede Shirt Jacket

J.Crew Partners With Masseria San Domenico

Who: J.Crew

What: Partnership with Masseria San Domenico

Where: Puglia, Italy and online at jcrew.com

What: J.Crew is having an Italian summer. This June, the iconic American brand partnered with boutique hotel Masseria San Domenico in Puglia for an exclusive activation from June 17th-20th. The two celebrated the collaboration, inviting a curated selection of tastemakers for a weekend of seaside activities. If you’re unable to make your way to Italy this June, the partnership is also commemorated by a capsule collection of home goods, summer apparel, and accessories, all available online at jcrew.com.

J.Crew Masseria San Domenico X J.Crew silk bandana

J.Crew Masseria San Domenico X J.Crew Gamine eyelet-trim shirt

J.Crew Masseria San Domenico X J.Crew embroidered baseball cap

(RED) and La DoubleJ Team Up for a Rose-Filled Collaboration

Who: (RED) and La DoubleJ

What: Capsule collection

Where: Online at ladoublej.com

Why: This summer, you can shop for a good cause. (RED) and Milan-based homeware and apparel designer La DoubleJ have teamed up for an exclusive capsule collection. La DoubleJ founder J.J. Martin has long admired (RED)’s leadership in the fight against AIDS and was inspired to create a unique rose-covered print that embodies the spirit of both the organization’s mission and the women-led community of her own brand. In addition to the three-piece collaboration, Martin and (RED) creative council chair Laura Brown met in New York to shoot a star-studded campaign featuring empowering women, including Iman, Busy Philipps, and Micaela Erlanger. All proceeds from the collaboration will be donated to (RED) in support of its ongoing initiatives. The pieces are now available online at ladoublej.com.

La DoubleJ Mini Foulard Eclipse Burgundy

La DoubleJ Pull-Up Shorts

La DoubleJ Better Than Your Boyfriend's Shirt

Haider Ackermann Releases His Second Collection With Canada Goose

Who: Canada Goose

What: Snow Goose by Canada Goose

Where: Online at canadagoose.com

Why: Haider Ackermann is keeping busy. Following his first collection for Canada Goose last fall, and his buzzy debut for Tom Ford, the all-star designer is showing no signs of slowing down. This summer, Ackermann is back for his second installment of Snow Goose by Canada Goose. Inspired by the rough-and-tumble terrain of Utah, the collection seamlessly blends the brand’s archives with breathable silhouettes and lightweight fabrics. The spring 2025 selection is available online now at canadagoose.com.

Canada Goose Dawn Crew Relaxed

Canada Goose Mesa T-Shirt

Canada Goose Dawn Crew Relaxed

Lele Sadoughi Partners With Fine Artist Gray Malin

Who: Lele Sadoughi

What: Capsule collection with Gray Malin

Where: Online at lelesadoughi.com

Why: New York City-based designer Lele Sadoughi and L.A.-based fine artist Gray Mallin have teamed up for a travel-inspired capsule collection. The two bonded over their shared hometown of Dallas and worked closely together to produce the 13-piece collaboration. Blending Sadoughi’s designs with Malin’s scenic photography, each piece is the perfect addition to your vacation wardrobe. The collection is now available online as well as at select Lele Sadoughi retailers.

Lele Sadoughi Capri Long Brim Bucket Hat

Now 78% Off

Lele Sadoughi Libby Provence Bow Barrette

Now 60% Off

Lele Sadoughi La Fontelina Bucket Bag

Now 83% Off

Longchamp Opens a Flower-Filled Sidewalk Café

Who: Longchamp

What: Sidewalk café

Where: Longchamp Fifth Avenue flagship

Why: Longchamp is brightening up the New York City sidewalks. From June 11 to July 6, the iconic brand will open an outdoor café, La Boulangerie, outside its New York City Fifth Avenue flagship. Crafted in collaboration with the world-famous Angelina Paris patisserie, the one-of-a-kind street dining experience features a delicious selection of Parisian pastries. As an official partner of Fifth Avenue Blooms, the café opening also kicks off a month-long floral installation that effortlessly captures the bustling energy of the city streets. Inside, the store will also debut a new capsule collection from ceramicist Constantin Riant, whose blue-and-white designs inspired the installation’s palette.

Longchamp Silk Scarf 70

Longchamp Cobalt Sweatshirt

Longchamp Canvas Tote Bag

Gap and Malbon Partner on a Golf Capsule

Who: Gap

What: Capsule collection with Malbon Golf

Where: Online at gap.com

Why: The weather is heating up, and so is the competition on the course. Blending classic prep style with athleticism, Gap and Malbon have partnered to release a 33-piece capsule that bridges the sport’s iconic style across every generation. Reimagined pieces include preppy polos, stylish Bermuda shorts, cable-knit vests, and perfectly worn-in T-shirts emblazoned with “PAR.” The collaboration launches alongside the “Generation Golf” campaign, shot by Duncan Wolf and starring five-time PGA tour winner Jesper Parnevik, as well as his children, Phoenix and Peg Parnevik—turning the event into a family affair.

Gap x Malbon Baseball Hat

Gap x Malbon Crop Polo Sweater

Gap × Malbon Plaid Pleated Mini Skort

Moncler Releases a New Footwear Collection

Who: Moncler

What: Third edition of Studio Ascenti

Where: New York City

Why: Moncler knows how to unveil a new collection, and for the third edition of Studio Ascenti—the open-format experiential footwear space which first launched in Milan and Paris—the brand brought footwear enthusiasts high above the New York City skyline. A new “family” of footwear, the Moncler Altive, was introduced, while three new iterations were added to the Moncler Trailgrip family along with special collabs from fashion insiders and celeb friends like Rick Owens, Donald Glover, and Willow Smith.

Moncler Trailgrip GTX Sneakers

Moncler Trailgrip Momint Nubuck & Suede Sneakers

Moncler Trailgrip Knit High Top Sneakers

Casablanca Opens a Flagship Store in Paris

Who: Casablanca

What: Flagship boutique

Where: Paris

Why: Casablanca is going worldwide. For the first time, the brand will open its doors in Paris on the iconic Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré—a sort of homecoming for designer and founder Charaf Tajer, who was born in the French capital. The exterior blends seamlessly with the classic architecture of the prestigious 8th arrondissement, meanwhile, the inside represents Casablanca’s contemporary DNA. Interior aesthetics channel a myriad of inspirations, including Japanese futurism, ancient Greece, and Stanley Kubrick’s 2001: A Space Odyssey. The boutique was created in partnership with London-based designers Counterfeit Studio and Moroccan architecture firm Elements Lab.

Casablanca Cotton Tuck Stitch Cropped Polo Shirt

Casablanca Crystal Embellished Denim Shorts

Casablanca Colourblock Swimsuit

Agua by Agua Bendita Taps Andrea Wild Botero for a Limited-Edition Capsule

Who: Agua by Agua Bendita

What: Capsule collection with Andrea Wild Botero

Where: Online at overthemoon.com

Why: Agua by Agua Bendita continues to craft the perfect summer wardrobe. This season, the Colombian brand is teaming up with independent artist Andrea Wild Botero for a capsule collection filled with embroideries inspired by her childhood in Cartagena. “This collaboration is a celebration of our shared love for Latin America and our commitment to exhibit the unexplored beauty of our region,” Mariana Hinestroza and Catalina Álvarez, co-founders and creative directors of the brand, said in a statement. Titled “Wild,” the 16-piece collab is filled with beautiful motifs depicting vegetation and wildlife, all nostalgic to Botero and signature to Agua by Agua Bendita designs. Silhouettes include flowing midis, textured minidresses, wrap skirts, and one-piece bathing suits in ornate patterns, perfect for any warm-weather occasion.

Agua by Agua Bendita Eslabon Wild Cropped top

Agua by Agua Bendita Barbara Wild Midi Dress

Agua by Agua Bendita Frontera Wild Midi Dress

Frame and Sotheby’s Release a Capsule Collection

Who: Frame

What: Exclusive capsule collection

Where: Online at frame-store.com

Why: Frame and Sotheby’s have confirmed that ’80s New York will never go out of style. This summer, the two have teamed up to release an all-new collaboration that honors the art auctioneer’s 281-year legacy and inspires the next generation of collectors. From oversized blazers to argyle sweaters and retro T-shirts cheekily emblazoned with “COLLECTOR,” the pieces are perfect for Gen Zers who aspire to dress like Carolyn Bessette Kennedy, off-duty Wall Street bros, and any prepster in between.

Frame Classic Tee

Frame Baseball Cap

Frame V-Neck Sweater
